headline: Halliburton Company (HAL) Extends Rally Amid Higher Oil Prices
summary: We recently published Market in Pain? Not For These 10 Celebrating Stocks. Halliburton Company (NYSE:HAL) is one of the top performers on Tuesday. Shares of oil drilling firm Halliburton Company (NYSE:HAL) extended their winning streak to a fourth consecutive day on Tuesday, jumping 7.34 percent to close at $24.27 apiece as investors snapped up shares […]
